statement:
Let $K$ be a closed of a normed vector space

1.  If $\{A_i\colon i\in I\}$ is a family of extreme subsets of $K$,
    such as $\bigcap_{i\in I}A_i\neq \emptyset$ then
    $\bigcap_{i\in I}A_i$ is extreme subset of $K$

2.  $A\subset B\subset K$ such as $A,B$ are extreme subsets of $B$ and
    $K$ respectively. Then $A$ is an extreme subset of $K$.
names: properties of extreme subsets of a closed convex set
